hero.title: The 24/7 digital property assistant and management platform

articleContent.title: Client
articleContent.description: AskPorter is a messaging platform using AI for optimization of various levels of management including property and facilities management,  admin, and cost management. It helps to provide better client service and enhance client satisfaction.

articleContent.title: Business needs
articleContent.description: The business faced two major tasks: to attract investment based on digital solutions and to increase the average checking of the client's payments by optimization of internal processes. The idea of digital solution came from the other side of the users' pain when someone wants to solve various domestic issues like water or gas leakage, waste disposal, etc. The old ways of solving such issues took a lot of time and were usually done through the phone (i.e., there was no possibility of checking a service order in real-time). So, the service which instantly takes orders and finds the required specialists with online status tracking is a really good way to solve business and users' pain.
